name: Watermelon Cucumber Punch
keywords: agave syrup, kirby cucumber, seedless watermelon
recipeIngredient: 2 Kirby cucumbers, peeled and cut into chunks
Thinly sliced cucumber rounds, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, purée watermelon until smooth. Strain and set aside 12 ounces juice.
Add cucumbers to blender with 1 tablespoon water. Purée until smooth. Strain and set aside 1 ounce juice.
In a cocktail shaker, combine watermelon juice, cucumber juice and all other ingredients. Shake well. Pour into ice-filled rocks glasses and serve, garnished with cucumber rounds.
